subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Horses
lead_paragraph: More than 40 horsemen have agreed to turn over records for the two weeks before any graded stakes races, which will be made available to the public two hours before post time.
snippet: More than 40 horsemen have agreed to turn over records for the two weeks before any graded stakes races, which will be made available to the public two hours before post time.
